plays.text: Penalty to Toni Lydman 2 minutes for Slashing Ian Laperriere
Penalty to Bob Boughner 2 minutes for Roughing Ian Laperriere
Goal scored by Craig Johnson assisted by Lubomir Visnovsky and Eric Belanger
Penalty to Lubomir Visnovsky 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla unassisted
2 minute Bench Penalty for Abuse of Official served by Jukka Hentunen
Penalty to Jason Allison 2 minutes for Tripping Ronald Petrovicky
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Denis Gauthier
Goal scored by Denis Gauthier assisted by Dean McAmmond and Craig Conroy
Penalty to Ian Laperriere 2 minutes for Roughing Bob Boughner
Penalty to Dean McAmmond 2 minutes for High Sticking Mattias Norstrom
Goal scored by Randy Robitaille assisted by Jason Allison and Lubomir Visnovsky
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jason Allison 2 minutes for Hooking Igor Kravchuk
Penalty to Jukka Hentunen 2 minutes for Interference Craig Johnson
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Charging Scott Nichol
